name: Basic-R-Graphics
tagline: Using basic graphics in R to create interesting plots.
body: ## Economist This is my re-working of a graphic from a 2011 issue of The Economist that I found nearly offensive in its badness. The RMarkdown HTML page showing the work and the rationale is here. ## WAV_Plot This is plot that I created for use in a journal article. It uses the space in a way that you might call "non-standard." The RMarkdown HTML page for this one is here. ## Jerusalem_Post This is a plot that re-works a disastrous set of pie charts from the Jerusalem Post related to the potential governments that could be formed after the election which had taken place on 17 March 2015. The RMarkdown HTML page for this one is here. ## Three-part plot This is a pair of plots created for a journal article. Each has three segments that required a good deal of tweaking to get just right.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
